title: Typeface similar to Masterfile logo
content:
Dear friends

I am looking for a type that look like the masterfile logo. Do you know some type similar to this one??

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823195643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/masterfile_6701.jpg)

Thanks and regards,

Nuno
author: Nuno Varela

comments.content: The Masterfile logo was created by [Underware](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823195643/http:/www.underware.nl/site2/index.php3?id1=logotypes2&start=0&findme=.&showthis=5&zoom=4#pictloader). It is custom.
Hmm. Ok I guess you knew that already. Sorry.

No I didn’t. Thanks to all.

I was looking for something similar...
